## Getting started with Juliaup

You can get [`juliaup`](https://github.com/JuliaLang/juliaup) and [Julia](https://julialang.org/) on Linux or Mac with:

``` bash
curl -fsSL https://install.julialang.org | sh
```
. . .

Or if you are using Windows, simply:

``` bash
winget install julia -s msstore
```

. . .

::: callout-note
Juliaup is the almost official cross-platform installer for the Julia programming language. This allows you to install and have multiple Julia versions and change smoothly between them.
:::

***

Now just type `julia` on the terminal:

```{.bash}
julia
```
